items.sentence: I\'ve learned a lot from you over the past year.
Tom started reading when he was three years old.
Tom still has one person he can always count on.
Tom stood next to Mary, whispering into her ear.
Tom said that he hadn\'t intended to insult you.
Tom promised Mary he wouldn\'t complain anymore.
I don\'t think Tom is ever going to get married.
I don\'t think Tom knows who taught Mary French.
It doesn\'t sound like you\'ll be working today.
I guess that I\'m going to have to learn French.
